page.title: 12EDUCATION -INVERNESS(WEST)
page.content: {A DAY IN THE SCHOOL LIFE OF EUAN {HIND(11YEARS OLD)}3RD MAY,1985. 0730 AWAKENED BY SISTER.WASH AND HAVE BREAKFAST. 0830 LEAVE FOR SCHOOL,WALKING THE HALF MILE. 0900 SCHOOL STARTS. STUDY BIBLE,MATHS ENGLISH. 1040 INTERVAL;ATE SWEETS.PLAYED FOOT- BALL WITH MY FRIENDS. 1100 PHYSICAL EDUCATION :ATHLETICS. 1245 LUNCH:SAUSAGES,CHIPS,BANANA,MILK 1330 DOMESDAY PROJECT. 1400 HISTORY:11WORLD WAR WHICH FINISHED 40YEARS ON 8THMAY'45 1430 QUIZ ON GENERAL KNOWLEDGE TO HELP IN "TOP OF FORM" QUIZ. EXHIBITION ORGANISED BY LOCAL POLICE. 1500 BELL RINGS FOR THE END OF THE DAY.TEACHERS WORK ON TILL LATER. {
